name: Disc Golf Online
description:
Online Multiplayer

Play Disc Golf with people all around the world! Challenge your friends, play a round with strangers. Play for fun or strive to become the best player in Disc Golf Online.

Procedural Generation

Never run out of courses to play! A smart algorithm creates new course layouts and builds interesting terrain around it. Just enter a seed and the algorithm will produce a unique course from it. You can always save your favourite courses to play them again later.

Physics Simulation

A flying disc is no easy physics problem, and a lot of simulations get it wrong. Disc Golf Online uses an aerodynamics-based approach that tries to mimic how the disc interacts with air around it. The physics model is carefully calibrated with real disc flights, to ensure the most realistic disc physics.
